channel.title: [317]Help making safe zone in pvp area[delta]
channel.description:
I just made my server into a pvp server...I got everything set. Now I just need to turn a couple places into a non-pvp zone (safe zone).
I found a tut here [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=422419.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=422419.0[/url] BUT he says that I have to search for "public boolean nonwildUnder" which I can not find in my client.java -Is there an other way to do this?

item.title: [317]Help making safe zone in pvp area[delta]
